Kind of like Pirates, Nations, SWATBU, houses, dating, new zombja maps, new Avatar Abilities, new Rides, and of course Heroes Quest… yeaa… unless some of these are rolled into Heroes Quest, which as we know is aimed at top end players who've completed everything up to and including WorldKaiju, I wouldn't hold my breath if I were you.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Smokeblossoms were put into another sink BECAUSE they're useless and there are too many. He just put another duct tape solution on one of many old lingering problems… that doesn't mean that awesomium coins are any less useless, or that stockpiling them now won't make him go 'I need to make a sink for awesomium coins'. It wouldn't be the first time he's looked at the biggest hoarders and judged the whole playerbase's counts by it. Just because there are ways to fix a problem down the line that doesn't serve as an excuse for creating the problem in the first place…

item.content:encoded:
I have no idea what you're talking about… regardless, here's the data. http://www.animecubed.com/billy/forum/viewtopic.php?f=36&t=17452
Crazy Hards right now are just inferior to top Extra Hards: undoubtedly so in terms of Tips, debatably so in terms of Ryo Coins. In my opinion we should just leave them alone until we have full stats, Fierce as the Flame and plenty of tips for cards, and then unlock CH work in the back… and then leave them alone. Manual EHs give way more tips profit anyway, and awesomium ryo coins are currently as useless as oxyblasts at time of writing. Crazy Hard rides are just another example of a content McM didn't finish with the excuse that it was going to be done later, and then moved on to procrastinate over something else entirely…

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: I'd like to point out a slight observation of mine. Some time ago, someone doubted the efficiency of Crazy Hard in comparison to lesser difficulties. For the most part, all you get is coins that serve next to no purpose other than ryo farming. The point—marketplace farming for kaiju drops. I know i must NOT be the only one who finds it difficult to either obtain crazy large amounts of ryo for MPfarming, nor the only one who finds toying with Counting Coup crazy hard in comparison to others who could use those drops for either themselves, or for MP ryo farming. don't ya think that the coin system was made to go around all that?
